tool.name: SAGA.grids_tools.0
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayLIST True isArrayTABLE False isArrayTABLE_Z False isArrayCOPY False output_data_GRIDS $output_data_GRIDS name SAGA.grids_tools.0 LIST $LIST NAME '$NAME' DELETE $DELETE ATTRIBUTES $ATTRIBUTES TABLE $TABLE TABLE_Z $TABLE_Z NFIELDS $NFIELDS ZFIELD $ZFIELD COPY $COPY COPY_SET $COPY_SET prefer $prefer response $response outputType_GRIDS $OutputSection_GRIDS.outputType_GRIDS transmissionMode_GRIDS $OutputSection_GRIDS.transmissionMode_GRIDS

param.name: LIST
param.label: Single Grids
param.help: Single Grids The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, png, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: TABLE
param.label: Attributes
param.help: Attributes The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: TABLE_Z
param.label: Z Attribute
param.help: Z Attribute The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: COPY
param.label: Copy from Grid Collection
param.help: Copy from Grid Collection The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, png, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_GRIDS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_GRIDS
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Create a new grid collection from existing grids.
